rows.label: qst660108_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo-mo! Who is Nopon you see before
you? Very good of friends to ask!

rows.label: qst660108_msg0002
rows.name:
Orderly of Nopon Archsage
is me! Very personal identity!
Very important role!

rows.label: qst660108_msg0003
rows.name:
In short, me have to lug heavy
articles of Nopon Archsage around,
sometimes for long periods on end!

rows.label: qst660108_msg0004
rows.name:
Now, me have something very
important to tell friends,
so listen closely...

rows.label: qst660108_msg0006
rows.name:
Truth is, me have great passion
for... for Noponstone.

rows.label: qst660108_msg0007
rows.name:
It have muddy, dim, faintly disturbing
light... In fact, shares many attributes
with Nopon Archsage himself.

rows.label: qst660108_msg0008
rows.name: But let me get straight to point.

rows.label: qst660108_msg0009
rows.name:
If friends perchance upon Noponstone,
can do wily-sneaky exchange for
Archsage's treasure stashes.

rows.label: qst660108_msg0010
rows.name:
He have so many already, he not
notice if one or fifty go missing.

rows.label: qst660108_msg0011
rows.name:
Anyway, that all me wanted to say.
Hope to be doing business soon!
